title: Yasuo's Windwall
body: Why cant his wind wall block lux/vel'koz ult and xerath's  "q"

replies.body: Because those skills are not projectiles.

Wind Wall blocks projectiles.

Projectiles have a travel time.

Xerath's Q, Vel'koz's R and Lux's R are all AoEs with no travel time.

Wind wall blocks projectiles (attacks that have to travel from point a to point b) but it does not block against skills (moves that don't have a travel time to the target but rather are instantaneous)
